name: Karma
description: Karma is an on‑chain neobank built for the world to use crypto and stablecoins as everyday money. We combine real bank accounts, payment cards, and instant payments with self‑custodial rails, bridging traditional banking and decentralized finance in one wallet. Our aim is simple: replace fragmented financial tools with a primary banking experience that works across borders and settles instantly, while aligning finance with positive impact.
